__e: The rest of you, make room in your luggage for 10 liters apiece.
Without food can survive weeks, but without water maybe three days.
Keep pushing the fluids, try for 2,000 a day, okay?
You can swallow a pint of blood before you get sick.
You know that a man dies if he loses five pints of blood?
The only thing is, what I want isn't gasping for air and losing a pint of blood every ten minutes.
The new diapers absorb a whole quart.
I've never let a million gallons of water into a ship before.
What do you pay for a liter of water that is packed to your home, Miss Kobi?
I've got a five gallon can of gasoline out in my truck that I will happily pour down your fucking throats if I ever catch you cooking and stinking up my town again.
We've got 218 litres of gas, and then we've got nothing!
A couple of litres of gasoline could do the trick.
